name: Adventure Express Safari
description: This safari will take you to the the spectacular flamingo pink rimmed Lake Nakuru. Experience the panoramic views of the lake and the picturesque Lake Nakuru National Park. Then drive to the rolling plains of Masai Mara teeming with wildebeest, gazelles and zebras during the migration months. A wildlife safari puts you right in the middle of all this action. You acquaint yourself with the landscapes of this beautiful African setting.
